name: Principles of Finance
description: An introduction to basic concepts and analytical tools in financial management. Building on the fundamental concept of time value of money, the course will examine stock and bond valuations and capital budgeting under certainty. Also covered are risk-return trade-off, financial planning and forecasting, and long-term financing decisions.
prerequisites: MGEB11H3/(ECMB11H3) and MGAB01H3/(MGTB05H3) and [MGTA35H3 or MGTA36H3]
